mapper.select: select * from abk_recording WHERE group_name = #{group_name} or group_name = 'www'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO abk_recording ( group_name, is_public, sa_prefix, template_id, template_name, template_class, abl_id, is_old, document_name, document_type, create_date ) VALUE ( #{group_name}, #{is_public}, #{sa_prefix}, #{template_id}, #{template_name}, #{template_class}, #{abl_id}, #{is_old}, #{document_name}, #{document_type}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') )
mapper.update: UPDATE abk_recording SET sa_prefix = #{sa_prefix}, template_id = #{template_id}, template_name = #{template_name}, template_class = #{template_class}, abl_id = #{abl_id}, is_old = #{is_old}, document_name = #{document_name}, document_type = #{document_type}, update_date = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %T') WHERE abk_id = #{abk_id}
